name: Ronald SMITH, Petitioner v. CLERK OF COURT, PCRA Unit of the Court of Common Pleas Philadelphia County, Respondent

parties: Ronald SMITH, Petitioner v. CLERK OF COURT, PCRA Unit of the Court of Common Pleas Philadelphia County, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 23rd day of September, 2008, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
957 A.2d 227
Ronald SMITH, Petitioner v. CLERK OF COURT, PCRA Unit of the Court of Common Pleas Philadelphia County, Respondent.
No. 68 EM 2008.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 23, 2008.
